description_txt: stated on June 25, 2014 in a YouTube video:
quote_txt: "Global warming is a hoax."

description_txt: stated on July 31, 2014 in a campaign commercial:
quote_txt: Says Rick Scott "raised property taxes."

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2014 in an interview with Georgia Public Broadcasting:
quote_txt: Since 1999, 440 people have been killed in attacks on church property in the United States.

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2014 in a syndicated column:
quote_txt: Oregon’s "three largest employers, and 13 of the top 25, are health care providers."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2014 in comments on CNN:
quote_txt: Israel in the last three weeks has "killed more Palestinian children, more than 200, than the total number of Israeli soldiers killed in military operations since 2006."

description_txt: stated on July 30, 2014 in a House floor speech:
quote_txt: "We did not seek an impeachment of President Bush."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2014 in an interview with Sean Hannity of Fox News:
quote_txt: Says three Ukrainians recently captured on a West Texas ranch are among "individuals from countries that have strong terrorist ties being apprehended" near the state’s border with Mexico.

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2014 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: Says U.S. House candidate Carlos Curbelo "opposes the repeal of Obamacare."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2014 in a fundraising letter:
quote_txt: "The House of Representatives has never sued a sitting president in all of U.S. history."

description_txt: stated on July 28, 2014 in an interview on Univision Radio:
quote_txt: "We would create thousands of jobs in Colorado, if the Keystone Pipeline were to be built."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2014 in comments on his show:
quote_txt: Because of the current immigration crisis, Republicans want to "repeal" a 2008 law that President George W. Bush signed and "want to be on record as not wanting to protect children from ... sex trafficking."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2014 in his speech at the Texas Democratic Party convention:
quote_txt: Says John Cornyn dodged the draft during the Vietnam War.

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2014 in a campaign TV ad:
quote_txt: Mary Burke "wasted 12.5 million dollars on a vacant lot" in a move that "could cost taxpayers nearly $25 million."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2014 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says Rep. Bruce Braley, D-Iowa, "skipped an important VA reform hearing to attend three fundraisers."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2014 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says Rep. Bruce Braley, D-Iowa, missed "79 percent of veterans affairs committee hearings."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2014 in a campaign email:
quote_txt: "Women in Florida make 83 cents for every dollar a man makes."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2014 in a segment on RT's "CrossTalk":
quote_txt: "I'm not a conspiracy theorist and I never allow conspiracy theorists on my program."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2014 in his "Focal Point" radio show:
quote_txt: "We know how to stop AIDS: persuade men not to have sex with men."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2014 in an interview:
quote_txt: Twenty percent of single adults, ages 21 to 25 with no kids, "are not working or even in school trying to find a job."

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2014 in a meme on social media:
quote_txt: "97 percent of the 100 poorest counties in America are in red states."

description_txt: stated on July 22, 2014 in an interview on Fox News.:
quote_txt: "We’ve had about 3,000 murders" in connection with lax border security.

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2014 in campaign email:
quote_txt: Says Mark Pryor "continues to insist" that Obamacare is "an amazing success."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2014 in a speech to the NAACP in Las Vegas:
quote_txt: The Obama administration's policies "have reduced minority dropout rate by 25 percent."

description_txt: stated on July 22, 2014 in comments on his radio show:
quote_txt: The United States is the leading nation in the world "with the highest amount of doubt about the conventional wisdom of climate change."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2014 in a speech at Catholic University:
quote_txt: "Having an active father makes children 98 percent more likely to graduate from college."

description_txt: stated on July 14, 2014 in an interview:
quote_txt: Milwaukee County taxpayers paid $370,000 to settle a lawsuit over a decision by Sheriff David A. Clarke Jr. to use "untrained corrections officers" rather than deputies to patrol the lakefront.

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2014 in radio interview :

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2014 in an interview on "Fox & Friends":
